comment.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): It does not work there, it seems Zeronet do not use indexes (do not show files in folder where is not index.html)
> For example, adventure category: http://127.0.0.1:43110/14tchCH1HveUXqGfVZMZKp6VtNyYYjc2UT/adventureI do not see links to files.
> It seems you need to add index.html files and each should contain links to all files in particular directory..


Not all the mirror is still OK, I'm still in the process of correcting the links, it's worth the link tip
